Order query

A symbol of luck and longevity across Asia, the crane bird is a unique design element you can add into your home. This cool mint green wallpaper features soaring cranes in white with navy and red details. We recommend this crane print, green wallpaper as a feature for a living room, bedroom or hallway.

Placeholder content for this accordion, which is intended to demonstrate the .accordion-flush class. This is the third item's accordion body. Nothing more exciting happening here in terms of content, but just filling up the space to make it look, at least at first glance, a bit more representative of how this would look in a real-world application.
